3: You... you've found the antigen?
You overthink it. I know even less than you.
Are your men safe?
Yeah. Bianca...
I've kept my end of the bargain. I'll be leading my men away from this hellhole now.
I don't want anything to do with this place anymore.
I suggest you keep an eye on their physical conditions...
...Are you hiding something?
(Turns and leaves) Take care, Watanabe of the Forsaken...
...Forsakens! Retreat.
I have to get him away from here. If he finds out that his people were experimented on...
The retriever is still analyzing the antigen from their tissues. I'm sure it won't be long before I find out its detailed composition.
I've got the antigen, but the commandant is still in danger.
The guards on the outskirts of the buildings have been thinned out. If I retreat now, I can regroup with the Joint Task Force in less than half an hour.
Commandant...
If I go further inside, I'll run into the Queen's royal guards sooner or later...
And the antigen might get destroyed in the fight...
But if I leave now, who else will come for the commandant?
(Turns on comms) Gray Raven, I don't know if you'll hear this...
I just want to say that... this is Bianca. I'm here. I'll save you, Commandant.
